title: SKT 1 Nami Skin Bug
body:
• Server: NA

• Type of Bug: In Game

• Description: SKT 1 Nami skin doesn't show Wolf's signature during the recall animation as well as not showing the SKT logo. I checked with the SKT 1 Syndra and Jhin skins which had their signatures working fine.


• Reproduction rate: 3/3, happened in game then in a practice tool game, restarted as well , still was happening consistently.

• Steps to reproduce:

Select SKT 1 Nami

Channel Recall

• Expected result: The SKT 1 Nami skin should have SKT Wolf's Signature show up under Nami during the recall animation, as well as the SKT 1 Logo.

• Observed result: The signature and logo is not showing during the recall animation on the SKT 1 Nami Skin

• System Specs: Intel i5 Processor, Windows 10, GTX 1060
